video.title: Battleground Afghanistan
video.synopsis: Follow Capt. Ben Middendorf and the men of Golf Company, 2nd Battalion, 5th Marines, as they bravely fight Taliban forces in Afghanistan.

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Ben Middendorf and the men of Golf Company, 2nd Battalion, 5th Marines, strive to disrupt and destroy the Taliban without losing a single man.
episodes.title: First Contact

episodes.synopsis: Golf Company must reach and clear a drug baron’s compound while under constant fire and the looming threat of I.E.D's -- improvised explosive devices.
episodes.title: Booby Traps & Poppy Fields

episodes.synopsis: Golf Company continues their relentless surge, encountering civilians for the first time, and hunting for the enemy’s command center.
episodes.title: Fighting Ghosts

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Middendorf hopes to deal a lethal blow to a Taliban command and control center before their fighters recover from his company's latest attack.
episodes.title: Trapped by the Taliban

episodes.synopsis: Golf Company faces one more mission before returning home: raiding a narcotics processing site. It turns grim when they are separated and under fire.
episodes.title: Homeward Bound
